stimulusHtml: The graph shows the pressure of a gas in a sealed container as a function of the temperature of the gas. Which of the following claims are supported by the graph?
choicesHtml: There is a temperature that corresponds to zero pressure.
There is a maximum possible temperature of an ideal gas.
The pressure of a gas is proportional to the volume of the gas at a constant temperature.
The temperature of a gas is proportional to the volume of the gas at a constant pressure.
